## Trove.whatChanged() method

Calculate the difference between this Trove and another.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
whatChanged(that: Trove, borrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<TroveChange<Decimal> | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  that | [Trove](./arth-base.trove.md) | The other Trove. |
|  borrowingRate | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) | Borrowing rate to use when calculating a borrowed amount. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TroveChange](./arth-base.trovechange.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| undefined&gt;

An object representing the change, or `undefined` if the Troves are equal.
